oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Frank Adkins with family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Frank Adkins with his wife, Charlotte, and his family. Charlotte holds a large bouquet of flowers tied together with striped ribbon. In the background on the photograph, people can be seen poking their heads out open windows. From left to right, Ethel Darnell Adkins, Grover Cleveland Adkins, Margaret Adkins, Frank Adkins, Charlotte Nicodemus Adkins.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Families
